wikipedia_page.main: John Bradford (born 15 December 1979) is a Scottish former footballer who played for Ayr United, Dumbarton, Stenhousemuir, Stranraer, Albion Rovers and East Fife.

response: John Bradford (1510–1555) was an English reformer and martyr.
John Bradford may also refer to:
*John Bradford (Kansas politician) (born 1951), member of the Kansas House of Representatives
*John Bradford Fisher (born 1953), American plastic surgeon, pioneer in fat removal
